verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, my heart <S%H3820><s%> is not haughty <S%H1361><s%>, nor mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> lofty <S%H7311><s%>; Neither do I exercise <S%H1980><s%> myself in great matters <S%H1419><s%>, Or in things too wonderful for me <S%H6381><s%>.

Surely I have stilled <S%H7737><s%> and quieted <S%H1826><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>; Like a weaned <S%H1580><s%> child with his mother <S%H517><s%>, Like a weaned child <S%H1580><s%> is my soul within me <S%H5315><s%>.
O Israel <S%H3478><s%>, hope <S%H3176><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> From this time forth and for <S%H5704><s%> evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
